description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in CRM Perks CRM Perks Forms – WordPress Form Builder allows Stored XSS.This issue affects CRM Perks Forms – WordPress Form Builder: from n/a through 1.1.2.

product.name: CRM Perks Forms – WordPress Form Builder
